name: R. J. COLARDO, INC., et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.
name_abbreviation: R. J. Colardo, Inc. v. Zoning Board of Review of Cranston

parties: R. J. COLARDO, INC., et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Joseph C. Manera, Jr., Cranston, for petitioner.
Carroll, Kelly, Murphy, S. Paul Ryan, Providence, for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
R. J. COLARDO, INC., et al. v. ZONING BOARD OF REVIEW OF the CITY OF CRANSTON et al.
No. 82-238-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
July 1, 1982.
Joseph C. Manera, Jr., Cranston, for petitioner.
Carroll, Kelly, Murphy, S. Paul Ryan, Providence, for respondent.
